fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Force a host error to occur. The host will intentionally perform a minor error when processing the night actions. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every time the host makes a host error, you are informed of exactly what happened. You may then gain one use of your choice of the following: a Basic attack, a Basic autovest, or a vote that counts as three.
- You may reroll this role for free.
